metadata.title: YouTube Banner Size 2025: Channel Art Dimensions & Specs
metadata.description: The exact YouTube banner size and dimensions. Resolution, safe zones, and how to design channel art that looks great everywhere.

hero.headline: YouTube Banner Size & Dimensions in 2025
hero.subheadline: The exact specifications for perfect YouTube channel art that displays correctly on all devices.

sections.content: YouTube channel banners display differently on TV, desktop, tablet, and mobile. Getting the size right ensures your branding looks professional everywhere. This guide provides the exact dimensions, safe zones, and design tips for perfect channel art.

content.title: Full Dimensions
content.description: 2560 x 1440 pixels. This is the full banner size that YouTube requires.

content.title: Safe Zone
content.description: 1546 x 423 pixels (centered). This area is visible on all devices.

content.title: File Size
content.description: Under 6MB. JPG, PNG, or GIF format accepted.

sections.title: Banner Specifications
content: Format: JPG, PNG, GIF, or BMP
Keep important content in center safe zone

sections.title: Designing Your Banner
content: Mark the 1546 x 423 safe zone in center
Place logo and key text in safe zone
Extend design to full canvas for TV viewers
Check preview on all device types

sections.title: Banner Design Best Practices
content: Keep text and logos in safe zone
Preview on multiple devices before finalizing

faq.question: Why does my banner get cropped?
faq.answer: YouTube displays different areas based on device. Only the center 1546 x 423 pixels show on mobile. Design with this safe zone in mind.

faq.question: What resolution should my banner be?
faq.answer: Minimum 2048 x 1152, recommended 2560 x 1440 pixels. Higher resolution ensures sharp display on TVs and large monitors.

faq.question: Can I use animated banners?
faq.answer: GIFs are technically accepted but won't animate on YouTube. Use static images for best results. Save animation for intros and videos.

faq.question: How often should I update my banner?
faq.answer: Update for major milestones (subscriber counts), seasonal events, or when branding changes. Monthly updates are excessive, annual is minimum.
